AVSEC ORDER NO .02 / 2010 
 
 
Sub:       Attempted  Act of Sabotage on Northwest Airlines Flight. 
 
 
 
 
Consequent upon the attempted act of sabotage on Northwest Airlines 
recently, the following countermeasures shall be taken by all concerned for 
immediate solution:- 
 
(i) 
100% pat down search shall be carried out by ASG/APSU during the                
pre-embarkation security checks to give deterrent effect, till further order. 
 
(ii) 
In order to ensure privacy of the passengers, Airport Operators shall set 
up  private screening areas for pat down search of passengers. 
 
2. 
This order is issued in exercise of powers conferred by Section 5A of 
Aircraft Act 1934 delegated vide Government of India, Ministry of Civil Aviation, 
Notification No. 1797 dated 03 July 1997. 
 
 
 
 
(Rohit Nandan) 
Commissioner of Security (CA)
